page.title: 15ATTITUDES
page.content: I like living in Tenterden because my best friend called Ruth Bourne lives there. I don't like Tenterden all that much. I used to live in Watchet and that was better than here. My dad works all over Kent because he is a Methodist minister and he preaches at different churches and visits people. My mum has not got a job but she helps in Homewood Lower School library sometimes. When I am not at school, I watch television, or go down town or go to the rec. to play with my friends. I go to Brownies and the Homewood Music Centre on Tuesdays. Sometimes I help my mum in the kitchen. I think Tenterden is quite a good place for shopping, but it could be better.It has quite good friendly people and the houses are nice. I used to live in Watchet in Somerset.
